Package se.rupy.http

Interface Summary
Chain.Link  
Deploy.Stream  
 

Class Summary
Chain  
Daemon A tiny HTTP daemon.
Deploy Hot-deploys a service filter from disk with dynamic class loading, eventually after receiving it through a HTTP POST.
Event Asynchronous HTTP request/response, this virtually represents a client socket, but in the case where the server is behind a proxy we cannot expect to see that representation since sockets will be reused by multiple different external clients, it's a performance tradeoff that we gladly accept since hiding behind an Apache or some other proxy is this server probable use.
Input  
Output  
Query HTTP request.
Reply HTTP response.
Service The service filter is like a servlet which describes its own identifier.
Session  
Worker Worker gets the job done.
 

Exception Summary
Failure The failure, if thrown, does not display the error to the user but disconnects the client.
